text: The 1997 Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer season was the 7th season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. The 1997 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Soccer Tournament was hosted by Evansville and won by Creighton. == Teams == == MVC Tournament == == See also == * Missouri Valley Conference * Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer tournament * 1997 NCAA Division I men's soccer season * 1997 in American soccer == References == Category:Missouri Valley Conference Category:1997 NCAA Division I men's soccer season
title: 1997 Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer season
